thread.title: Union prez on ban: ‘I don’t see it as a bad thing’
thread.title_full: Union prez on ban: ‘I don’t see it as a bad thing’

author: Jack Encarnacao
title: Union prez on ban: ‘I don’t see it as a bad thing’
text: Jack Encarnacao Monday, January 30, 2017 Credit: AP In this Jan. 29, 2017, rally participants Zorzy Borga, left, and Carlos Castaneda, holding a pamphlet of the US Constitution, both of Elizabeth, N.J., participate in a rally in Elizabeth outside the Homeland Security Detention Center protesting President Donald Trump's executive order banning travel to the U.S. by citizens of Iraq, Syria, Iran, Sudan, Libya, Somalia or Yemen. (Thomas E. Franklin/The Record via AP)
